articles.description: Coventry City news from CoventryLive as opposition boss Chris Wilder makes admission about Sky Blues striker Gyokeres
articles.content:
Chris Wilder admits he tried to buy Coventry Citys Viktor Gyokeres in the summer.
 The Middlesbrough boss witnessed another outstanding display from the Sky Blues striker who first caught his eye wh… [+2571 chars]
